website_summaries.verdict: This three-pack of diving mermaids is a fantastic way to encourage kids to exercise and practice swimming underwater.
pros: Quickly sinks to the bottom of the pool
Each mermaid is five inches tall

customer_reviews.title: Less than thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have read the reviews before I ordered this product, as they appeared much larger in the photos and I was not expecting one of them to be topless...
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Stone

customer_reviews.title: Fun mermaid toy
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these. They play with them in and out of the pool. The "bras" come off pretty easily, though, making them look a bit like the fem-bots from Austin Powers, much to the amusement of my husband.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One of the three dolls was defective when taken out of the package. The bikini top came off and it is unrepairable -not adhering to the doll. The other 2 were great and timeliness of delivery and packaging were great.
customer_reviews.author: rachel gluzman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: $3 in the dollar store. $12.95 on Amazon. Fell apart upon opening the package. Two arms missing. Hair popped off.
customer_reviews.author: brenda howe

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I fully inderstand that this is a plastic toy but I have to say there was a lot of tears and disappointment when the arm snapped off of one of the mermaids within 12 hours of owning them (most of which were sleeping hours). Especially since she was not moving it in a way that should have warranted breakage. So for $12 I was hoping they would last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Turner

customer_reviews.title: COLORS ARE NOT THE SAME
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because my daughters' friends have them. But they got the ones pictured in the main photo. These were disappointing especially since her favorite color is purple. When I reached out to the company, they basically told me that I could just return them then re-order but I'd risk getting these ugly colors again. We will keep them just to avoid the hassle but I won't buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Dive Sticks
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old daughter is currently obsessed with swimming and mermaids. So, this was the perfect summer toy. She saved up her money and bought this for the pool. They are basically just little mermaid dive sticks. But, they're very cute and my daughter loves them. They've also generated some attention at the pool from other little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Queen City Mama

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!!! In fact we liked them so much that I ordered another set after picking some up at a local store! They ran out so I sought them out on Amazon!! My neighbor dog sat for us and said her girl played with them each day and loved them just as much as my girls so we gotnher a pack too!! They are durable and the paint looks great. They are the perfect size and sink nicely for dive and go catch games!!! My five year old loves to take them to the pool. My 1.5 year old enjoys playing with them in the tub and in the water table. Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Marya Mann

customer_reviews.title: Reselling TJ Maxx products for a higher price
customer_reviews.text: My packages arrived with TJ Maxx price tags. Reselling things from TJ Maxx at a higher price to Amazon customer?? So tacky. Be smart enough to remove the price tag before you ship it. Now I’m just annoyed that I paid what I did. Moral of the story... just go to TJ Maxx and you’ll get them cheaper
customer_reviews.author: tre.a

customer_reviews.title: Seller left the original price tag on!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. Apparently you need to go to Marshall’s to get this for half the price. Pretty tacky to leave the price tag on. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These were cute mermaid but they didn’t come in the colors shown. Would have returned but my daughter already opened.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but fun?
customer_reviews.text: These are super cheap toys that my daughter inexplicably loves. First off, if you’re expecting them to be like actual dive sticks that stand up on the bottom of the pool, you will be disappointed. They sink and then lie almost flat. They also break easily (an arm broke off on day 2.). Having said that, my 3 year old is obsessed with them and has been playing with them and carrying them everywhere, not just in water, since they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea E.

customer_reviews.title: Great diving toys
customer_reviews.text: The mermaids were a little bit smaller than I expected however that was on my end because I did not read how big they were. By the picture I thought they were more like a Barbie doll size. And they’re only about half the size. However they are great Quality within the pool they stand upgrade and easy to see using them for diving.
customer_reviews.author: amy l.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Obviously over priced as they didn't even bother taking off the cheaper price tag from where they got it. Like others have said bad quality toys. Arms and bras broke off in less than an hour of play.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Strode

customer_reviews.title: Seller could have at least removed the evidence that I overpaid
customer_reviews.text: Got these as bath toys for my daughter. They're relatively cheaply made, but were also cheaply (or so I thought) priced at $7.37. Apparently I way overestimated their worth, because they arrived with the still attached TJ Maxx price tag marked $3.99, comparing to $5. Ooof. Oh well. My daughter loves them as and so far they haven't turned into topless mermaids like in some of the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: KulDip711

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, but poorly assembled. The swim suits the mermaids are wearing were not applied properly so their areas that should be under the suit where not. A little weird for my kids to discover. And we already left them at a public pool and had them stolen because who is going to want to turn a fun mermaid diving toy back into the lost and found.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrs.R

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves these, perfect for practicing swimming. The sink pretty fast. Durable quality (although my rambunctious 2 year old broke an arm off), vibrant colors. Only “complaint” is they are a bit small and the face details are nothing special. But perfect for days in the pool (or as toys)
customer_reviews.author: Waldo608

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. Questionable quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute amd my daughter was thrilled to receive them for playing with in our new pool. Only giving four stars because I think quality could be better. One of the mermaids lost an arm the first time she played with them. She was just throwing them in the pool and retrieving them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we opened the package we realized one mermaids arm didn't move like the others. One of the Mermaids seashell tops fell off and could not be replaced. These are not worth the money. Disappointed in this company (Banzai) as a whole as well as their horrible customer service. We had a double water slide less than 2 months and it disintegrated and fell apart. They refused to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kristimarie Governale

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - product falls apart within two hours
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and take warning these products are ready to fall apart upon opening the product package. Within two hours from opening the packaging, an arm fell off. Two mermaids are visually ready to come apart at the waist at any time. I am returning these and hoping to get a refund. Otherwise, we liked the presentation of the mermaids, but wished they were made better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little bath/pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute little mermaid toys. They keep my daughter busy and are a hit in the bath! Edit to add: the arms broke immediately. They are stationary however look like they should move. She tried to lift the arms and they have all since snapped off.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Fun play items for granddaughter until she decided the arms needed to move outward.
customer_reviews.text: The arms on these are a bit fragile and only meant to swivel in a single plane. (like a salute). Moving them out like jumping jacks snaps them off in a non-repairable manner. Oh well, they were cheap, and I guess mermaids can swim without arms.
customer_reviews.author: Allan J. Rood

customer_reviews.title: Breakable
customer_reviews.text: These are great little pool toys. Just the right size for children. Make sure to read the age as my two and a half year old grandson has snapped all three in half. I got them for him to play with in the tub and he loved them but was able to break them.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toy... not anything specific to pool use
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes of opening this an arm fell off (simply by lifting it). I should have read reviews apparently. These are not anything beyond a small cheap plastic toy. I thought they’d be a weighted and durable for use in the pool. Not worth $10
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Break easily, don't worry about the nips
customer_reviews.text: America is the only country in the world that freaks out over nipples. Dont turn on tv commercials in England! Your puritan retinas will burn! Anyway, daughter loves these. We got wrong colors, and arms broke 1st day. Found more at beach shop,going there for replacements.
customer_reviews.author: D-rail

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money for something better
customer_reviews.text: The arm of one of the dolls broke off right out of the package. Very disappointing to my daughters. I just purchased them and my daughters were looking forward to having new toys to play with on vacation. It’s too late to get a replacement at this point. Even so, I’m not sure I want to take the chance since these broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little girls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 yr old daughter to use in our pool. She loves playing with them and diving for them. Money well spent. One mermaid had an arm break off when her big brother sat on it though.
customer_reviews.author: ARDs

customer_reviews.title: These are great for little girls in the pool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a friends daughter to play with in the pool and they are adorable. In the water they turn brighter so you can see them. I think they are worth the money for a summertime gift for little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Minigirl

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young girls
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting these after reading negative reviews, but mine held up fine during toddler play in our pool and she enjoyed them very much! Bought the Barbie Mermaid and these served as fun “baby mermaids”
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: These are pool time fun!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened these I didn’t think they were that amazing. My girls? They love them so much. They play in their little pool with them every single day. For the money it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The break immediately
customer_reviews.text: Within 1 day the first arm came off. We glued it. Then another mermaid's arm came off. Glued that as well. Now the third mermaid has broken in the center. These look cute but are not strudy at all. At this price indont mind that they are short term toys but they have all broken within a few days, not even really getting used. If you buy them, grab some glue too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water play
customer_reviews.text: My three year old likes to take Barbie dolls into the tub or pool, and then I have to deal with ratty Barbie hair and tears about this later. These are a great alternative as a water toy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Castagne

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked them, but the arm came of one of the mermaids as soon as I took it out of the packaging. I hadn’t even given it to my kids yet, so now I’m concerned that the others won’t last long if actually played with.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Grace

customer_reviews.title: questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: The left arm of the purple-haired mermaid fell off immediately and cannot be reattached. My granddaughter is not pleased to have a a one armed mermaid. She liked the mermaids and hopes the other two will hold up in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Diving Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My little divers love those squids and other diving toys. But, sometimes you just gotta throw a mermaid (or three) into the mix. These are cute little pool toys that get the job done. Everyone at the pool wants to play with them too, so they definitely appeal to many!
customer_reviews.author: North Shore Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made dive toy
customer_reviews.text: These mermaids were the dive toys my granddaughter asked for. One of them was defective, in that one of the arms does not move. It’s stuck in the down position and they look too flimsy to try to force. Seemed more like a dollar tree purchase than an almost 9 dollar toy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolann

customer_reviews.title: Small, they sink
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great, I thought they would float, instead they sink to the bottom of the pool so the kids are constantly asking us to get them when they fall. They’re also very very small. They seem like something you could find at the dollar store. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Krystleyvonne

customer_reviews.title: Cute but do not last.
customer_reviews.text: My girls and I were so excited for these to come. The colors were very different from the picture which was ok, still cute and I should have read where it says colors may vary. We took these to the pool and a friend said she got a pack just like it at dollar tree and I paid over $9 so that was my 2nd little disappointment. The biggest thing however was that within a week they were all broken. Arms snap right off and bodies break in half. Upset with myself I wasted the money.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Y.

customer_reviews.title: Goodbproduct
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last year and they are great. Good quality, made well, colors nice, work great in pool. Ive 3 nieces and they get my $s worth. Lol i discovered these are not motorized as id thought
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arm broke off pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: I’d like these more if they floated but I do like that it doesn’t get water trapped in it. So I guess I cant complain about it not floating. But I didn’t like how easily one of the arms broke off after just a few uses. Pretty flimsy. All in all though my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Adeen

customer_reviews.title: Pricing problem
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing with the mermaids. My problem is I paid $6.99 for them and they had a sticker from Marshall’s for $3.99. Do not understand why the price was so different.
customer_reviews.author: Mspud

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Pool
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves mermaids for the pool. I searched lot of places before finding them here so I could buy more for him to throw in the pool. They hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D Asleson

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t need to flaunt their 100% profit
customer_reviews.text: I paid Barry $7.94 for this mermaid set. Open the package to find out Barry paid $3.99 at TJ Maxx! Only wish I could have been as lucky as Barry. Our mermaids arrived with their tops on(!) and survived their first adventure in the pool. 10/10 would buy again, but at TJ Maxx.
customer_reviews.author: JLK2683

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected and kinda cheap. One broke already and we have only had them a week. But my daughter still loved them to play with in her little pool and in the bath too.
customer_reviews.author: Mini's Mama

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my three-year-old daughter to play with in the pool. They quickly became one of her favorite toys and she plays with them in the pool, in the bath, in the car, on vacation and pretty much all the time! Others seem to have had quality issues but they have held up perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: grandkids love mermaids
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love them, glad to see others said that they use them in the bath tub, not just at the pool. I saved one of the 3 in the package for the day one of kids forgets it at the pool. :-)
customer_reviews.author: wileykat

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: We packed these for a Disney vacation and they were so fun for my daughter. They do sink well for diving, but they’re also cute just to play with.
customer_reviews.author: AJL1213

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: These were a disappointment. They are very small. We thought they would be fun at the beach but not really. Good only for older kids to dive for in a pool.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lockrey

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. They're going to fall apart by the end of the summer but at least my daughter will get to enjoy this year!
customer_reviews.author: J&K2013

customer_reviews.title: It's a dive toy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. We had some of these from a couple of years ago but over time they disappeared. (I'm pretty sure the Polaris picked them up and they were hidden in the bag with leaves and debris and go thrown away.) The sink and arms are movable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R Grozier

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Very cute concept, but product was poorly made. Mermaids fell apart within a few uses in the pool with 6 yr olds.
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter and arm broke of on 10 minutes. She was dedicated so bought a 2nd set. The blonde dolls arm broke off in 30 minutes. Not worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I thought the tails moved !!!! Kinda bummed out about that part but my 11 year old still liked them so still a win .
customer_reviews.author: Sophia S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute diving toys buy one broke before it was even played with, but it lead to a great discussion about disabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jenell O.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought thinking these mermaids were from a poor plastic. I was wrong. Great product! My daughter love them!
customer_reviews.author: DHelen

customer_reviews.title: Top missing
customer_reviews.text: One of the mermaids came packaged without her top. It was for my three granddaughters to play with in the pool so we got a good laugh out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B

customer_reviews.title: great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved these mermaids and made her cousin play with them (and her) in the pool. She had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Rip off.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived covered in oily black residue with a bargain discount price sticker $2 cheaper than what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Mermaids
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the mermaids and plays with them in the bathtub. It is especially nice that all three of them are different colors.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Threw mine in the garbage!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived with one of them having a huge black mark that was TOTALLY visible when the item was packaged. I needed them today so I opened the package. I’m only using 2 of the 3. I tried to clean the mark off, it was a flaw in production. Can’t believe they sent this!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These were much smaller than expected. I haven’t given them to the kids yet, but they look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Simple little (about 7 in long?) pool toy. Perfect for the little kids! They do sink FYI
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M

customer_reviews.title: Fun water toy
customer_reviews.text: These are great for enticing children to go under water during swim lessons. They are also fun to play with in the bath. My children approve ages 7 & 4
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diving toys!!
customer_reviews.text: Best little diving mermaids for fun under water activity for little girls. I teach swimming and these mermaids are a big hit!! So super happy I might buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Frausto

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother buying. The arm broke off two of the dolls as I tried to move them. They aren't able to be reattached. What a waste...
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They work fine in the tub
customer_reviews.text: Very small. But you get what you pay for it. My granddaughter was tickled to put them in the tub and play with them she didn't care that they were small.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: We love these and take them every single time we go to the pool. This is an excellent gift idea for a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gagliano

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these so much ! Having a great time with them.
customer_reviews.author: Likes shopping

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but so so quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them but one of the arms wouldn’t move, and when we tried it broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Don’t love the mix of colors on each one. The bras broke off of one right away. Overall they seem like they would stand up to beach and pool play.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen moeller

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Cute little mermaids and my daughter loved them. But the arms came off on two of them rather quickly. Not very durable
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old got nearly 20 minutes of playing time with these before they were irreparably broken. I paid $8, the price tag on the package said $3.99, and they were probably worth about $0.72.
customer_reviews.author: spoothbrush

customer_reviews.title: Would give zero stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these did anything but just sit there and they don't. My daughter was looking forward to little mermaids that swam, this aint it. Plus they came in the mail with a tj maxx sticker tag that read 2.99 but i bought them from here for 6 dollars SMH. Definitely not even worth the 2.99 Don't waste your time or money people.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Great little mermaids!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters like these so much I bought them another set to take home with them. I like the fact that the hair is molded on so they are easy to dry. They do not float but the girls love that the mermaids can dive to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: RD2D

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart the first day
customer_reviews.text: Within an hour of opening these, two of the mermaids had lost an arm. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.text: Cute. Smaller than what I expected. Also, even though they are advertised as "magical", they don't do anything or change in any way. My granddaughter likes them for bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good bath toy.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a gift and the little girl loves them. Super durable and perfect for water lovers. Works for bathtubs and small or big pools.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Excited to give these as birthday party gifts, BIG disappointment in quality. Every single one of them snapped in half at the waist while kids dove for them in the pool. Don’t waste your money, my girls don’t even play rough, in fact they were cherishing these wanting to keep them in their beds after the party.
customer_reviews.author: Bows

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset about this. I purchased these for my granddaughters but I will not be giving to them as 1 is not appropriate. If I could give a zero I would...
customer_reviews.author: Josie P.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced retail clearance.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I paid just over $8 for these. I got them and they had a TJMaxx sticker on them showing they'd been purchased at a retail store for $4. They're fine, just feel taken advantage of.
customer_reviews.author: jminshew01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter to dive and retrieve! She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks super easy
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not with it. Got these for my 2 yr old for her birthday. Within 5 minutes the arms snapped and broke off. Was not able to get replacement.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyD

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Arms fall off easily and not difficult to get back on.
customer_reviews.author: V. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Cute - a little delicate for small hands.
customer_reviews.text: Cute gift - arm broke in one of dolls on first day. My granddaughters still played with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amarilis L. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable pool toy little girls love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays with use in the kiddie pool. Every time she sees other little girls they want to play with the mermaids with her. She also uses them to dive for. This is a good toy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made... arms broke off with 1st use in pool
customer_reviews.author: Terry A

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time out of box
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This was a birthday gift. The arm broke off right after taking out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but smaller than expected. One arm broke off quickly
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Robbery
customer_reviews.text: Paid more than I should have .. 5 dollars more , left the Marshalls price tag on it ..
customer_reviews.author: Jose gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Cute mermaids
customer_reviews.text: Cute mermaids. My daughters love to play with these in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: I. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great shape!
customer_reviews.text: Package in new condition, great replacement for the ones we have loved for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter played with these at the pool all day. She shared them back and forth with friend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: They are fine cheap plastic. But after I purchased I found for $2.79 at Kroger. So pretty overpriced here- Shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 broke on day 1. No thank you.
customer_reviews.author: crystalee6

customer_reviews.title: Pool party!
customer_reviews.text: Used these at a mermaid themed pool party. Threw them in the pool and people were diving for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri P

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh....
customer_reviews.text: Was not item that was pictured. I received ones that were a different color, not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: rmvf

customer_reviews.title: Cheated
customer_reviews.text: Product is what I wanted, but I feel cheated. I paid $8.87 and it came with a TJ Max sticker $3.99
customer_reviews.author: sandee pascoe

customer_reviews.title: Fun for water play!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is obsessed with mermaids and these are her favorite to play in tub, pool or any kind of water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for smiles and thank yous
customer_reviews.text: I gifted these to my friends granddaughter. She plays with them in the tub and at the pool. She loves them. They even light up which is very exciting for a four year old.
customer_reviews.author: Veneta Golden

customer_reviews.title: Different colors
